title: Overall
stimulusHtml:
One point is earned for a correct identification of a way members of the Guardian Council are selected.  
Acceptable identifications include:

  • The supreme leader chooses one-half of Guardian Council members.

  • The head of the judiciary nominates one-half of Guardian Council members.

  • The Majles approves the nominees made by the judiciary.

One point is earned for EACH correct description of a specific function of the Guardian Council. 
Acceptable descriptions may include:

  • Vetting candidates for elections

  • Monitoring elections

  • Overseeing the Majles

  • Approving legislation passed by the Majles

  • Vetoing legislation passed by the Majles

  • Making sure laws or government actions are compatible with Islamic law

  • Making sure laws are compatible with the Constitution

  • Advising the supreme leader on matters related to jurist guardianship

A score of zero (0) is earned for an attempted answer that earns no points or an off-task answer.

A score of dash (—) is earned for a blank.
